data.title: Visits by Foreign Leaders
data.text: Prime Minister Marcelo Jose das Neves Alves Caetano Attended funeral of former President Eisenhower; met with President Nixon April 1. March 31–April 1, 1969 President Francisco da Costa Gomes Private visit. October 18, 1974 Prime Minister Mario Alberto Lopes Soares Private visit. April 21, 1977 President Antonio dos Santos Ramalho Eanes Attended North Atlantic Alliance Summit conference. May 30–31, 1978 Prime Minister Francisco Pinto Balsemao Official working visit. December 14–16, 1982 President Antonio dos Santos Ramalho Eanes State visit; visited New York City. Departed the U.S. September 20. September 14–17, 1983 Prime Minister Mario Alberto Lopes Soares Official working visit. Private visit to New York City afterwards. March 13–16, 1984 Prime Minister Anibal Antonio Cavaco e Silva Private Visit. Met with President Reagan September 9. September 7–9, 1986 President Mario Alberto Lopes Soares Private Visit. Met with President Reagan May 18. May 17–20, 1987 Prime Minister Anibal Antonio Cavaco e Silva Official Working Visit. February 23–25, 1988 President Mario Alberto Lopes Soares Met with President Bush during a private visit. June 26, 1989 Prime Minister Anibal Antonio Cavaco e Silva Official working visit. Private visit to New York City afterward. January 10–12, 1990 Prime Minister Anibal Antonio Cavaco e Silva Met with President Bush during a private visit. September 25, 1990 President Mario Alberto Lopes Soares Private visit. Met with President Bush Jan. 13; afterwards visited New York City. January 10–13, 1992 Prime Minister Anibal Antonio Cavaco e Silva Took part in U.S.-European Community meeting. April 21–23, 1992 President Mario Alberto Lopes Soares Attended dedication of the Holocaust Memorial Museum and met with President Clinton on April 21. April 20–22, 1993 Prime Minister Anibal Antonio Cavaco e Silva Working visit. October 11–13, 1994 Prime Minister Antonio Guterres Official working visit. April 2–4, 1997 Prime Minister Jose Manuel Durao Working visit. September 10, 2002 Prime Minister Jose Durao Working visit. June 5–6, 2003 Prime Minister Jose Socrates Was visiting as head of the EU Presidency. September 16–17, 2007 President Anibal Cavaco Silva Working visit. November 9, 2011 Prime Minister Pedro Passos Coelho Attended the NATO Summit Meeting in Chicago, IL. May 20–21, 2012
